definition: special (or reserved) train (or bus etc)/limousine/private car used as a taxi and booked via a smartphone app
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: He has a special car because he cannot walk.
Women only cars are available late at night and during the morning rush hour.
sentences.chinese: 女性專車僅在晚間和早晨高峯時間提供。

sentences.english: Take a knife, rushed to banks, there will be shuttle bus to pick you.
sentences.chinese: 拿把刀，衝到銀行，會有專車來接你的。

sentences.english: Arrive at Lisbon's Portela Airport where you'll be transferred to the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 抵達里斯本的波爾特拉機場，專車接送至酒店。

sentences.english: They're running a special train to the football match.
sentences.chinese: 他們爲這場足球比賽安排了一列專車。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Shushan Culture Cemetery also offers free shuttles for tomb sweepers.
sentences.chinese: 同時，大蜀山文化陵園還安排了專車免費接送。

sentences.english: Many city vehicles have been adapted for use as school buses.
sentences.chinese: 許多市內交通車都被改造爲校用專車。

sentences.english: Breakfast and shuttle-bus to the Fair are free during the Guangzhou Trade Fair.
sentences.chinese: 廣交會期間專車接送廣交會，並贈送免費早餐。

sentences.english: We have a shuttle bus from the airport, I think you can take it.
sentences.chinese: 我們在雞場有專車接送客人，你可以乘專車來。

sentences.english: We have a shuttle bus from the airport, I think you can take it.
sentences.chinese: 我們在雞場有專車接送客人，你可以乘專車來。

sentences.english: Return transport available for Tai Lam Chung race.
sentences.chinese: 只有大欖湧比賽提供來回專車接送。

sentences.english: Depart for Manila. Upon arrival, meet and transferred to Puerto Galera by car and boat.
sentences.chinese: 出發前往馬尼拉，抵達後轉乘專車及船往酒店。

sentences.english: Are there any cars for transporting passengers to the pier?
sentences.chinese: 有專車接送旅客到碼頭嗎？

sentences.english: A few minutes later Weinstein picks me up in a chauffeur-driven car.
sentences.chinese: 幾分鐘之後，韋恩斯坦用專車接我過去。

sentences.english: And they must provide for transportation to and from off-campus parties.
sentences.chinese: 而且如果是校外活動他們必須提供專車接送學生。

sentences.english: On arrival, the activities of the day, come back when a car traveling in school package.
sentences.chinese: 到達目的地後，活動一天，回來時乘坐學校包的專車。

definition: to ride (in a car or carriage)/to drive/to motor
to get on or into (a bus, train, car etc)
shuttle bus ferrying passengers between train stations on two different rail lines
jointing machine/riveter/welder/sealer/to meet a plane (i.e. to meet sb at airport)/to service a plane (of airport workers)
to take a taxi (in town)/to hitch a lift
to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
"through train" (refers to the idea of retaining previous legislature after transition to Chinese rule in Hong Kong or Macao)
